literals: "Time length in seconds before the dictation session ends due to lack of audio input in case there was no audio heard in the current session"
"Time length in seconds before the dictation session ends due to lack of audio input."
"Length in seconds for the dictation service to listen"
"Whether recording should start automatically on start"
"No dictation system found. In order to use dictation, add a dictation system like 'Windows Dictation Input Provider' to the Data Providers in the Input System profile"

Script used to start and stop recording sessions in the current dictation system.
For this script to work, a dictation system like 'Windows Dictation Data Provider' must be added to the Data Providers in the Input System profile.
Start a recording session in the dictation system.
Stop a recording session in the dictation system.
